1572160.name: Kazakh 'Jack Soundtrack
1572160.description:
The original Kazakh 'Jack soundtrack that accompanies Forrest as he travels across the Neo Kazakh badlands in Kazakh 'Jack!

Cinematic strings, traditional European/Asian instrumentation and modern melodies fuse in order to deliver an auditory banquet fit for a czar.

Hear looming soviet-inspired cello and accordion riffs, desert flutes, and corporate keys for a taste of what the irradiated wastelands of Neo Kazakhstan's several environments have to offer tourists and foreign workers alike.
